name: Super Fight 2: Street Gangs
description:
Download this game on Google Play to support us!

Welcome to "Super Fight: Street Gangs"

Like other warrior fighting games, you will have to join some powerful warriors to participate in the battles of strength, overcome difficult levels, where you will have to confront other powerful warriors. Join them and help your warriors win, bring glory to them.

"Super Fight: Street Match" is a challenging yet fun fighting game. The game has a free-fighting style, in the game you will experience many beautiful skills, with a hand-to-hand fighting style. In addition, you can also use weapons to increase the power of your character.

Our enemies are also extremely powerful warriors, if you are subjective you will encounter many difficulties. Be careful with the Boss, this is the strongest enemy that usually appears at the end of some levels, it has significantly greater strength than other enemies.
One trick for you to overcome these enemies is to use power ups, to increase the strength of the character.

The upgrade and unlocking of characters is an indispensable part of fighting games, it will help you become stronger. The more dark coins you need to collect, the more it can upgrade and unlock the characters you love. A tip for you, the time reward function is a function that can help you collect a lot of coins.

The game includes many game modes:
CAMPAIGN MODE
This is the mode that players need to pass each game screen to unlock other levels. In addition players need to collect enough stars to be able to unlock a new map!

ENDLESS MODE
This is a mode that does not limit the number of enemies you have to face, the number of coins you gain depends on the number of enemies you have destroyed. This is a great mode for you to collect coins!
